Help with Postgenomic statistics and rankings

Blogs

Blogs are ranked on the number of incoming links from other science blogs (in posts; not as part of the blogroll).

Journals

Journals are ranked on the number of posts from science blogs that link to one or more of their papers - not on the number of papers in the index.
